history.content:
Hi! I'm intending to major in cognitive science and thinking of minoring in either computer or data science. I'm personally interested in social science and Artificial Intelligence and was wondering what would be a better choice. I'm not totally sure if I want to go into the work field or research for AI, but I want to take more courses that would prepare me for CS 188 (Introduction to Artificial Intelligence) and have an overall understanding of AI. 

If anyone has experience in doing data science for AI or have any interests in AI and would like to touch upon this, it would be really helpful for me! thanks so much in advance!
history.subject: CS or Data Science Minor for AI interests
